text: The following lists the events of the 1929 Philadelphia Phillies season. == Offseason == * December 13, 1928: Heinie Sand and $10,000 were traded by the Phillies to the St. Louis Cardinals for Tommy Thevenow.Tommy Thevenow page at Baseball Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
